labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Mint 17.3 XFCE on latest Linux client.  It has also been reported on Windows 10 client as well so submitting as a general bug.
data.expected_result: To see what you type in channel topic
data.short_description: Channel Topic shows encoded symbols if you enter certain characters
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter {https://robertsspaceindustries.com/comm-link/rss},{inchat},{on}} in channel topic - View the channel topic
